Am using this page as a model for displaying only the Beldbank openbaar widget with no other content except the introduction. The folder of the images to be displayed should be always selected and the number of images to display per row and per page is configurable. If the selected folder has more images than the number of images that should be displayed per page, the images will be paginated and a very simple paginator will be displayed at the end of the page.
